posts.post_content:
Offered here is a 1914 B18 Blanket of Frank Chance. Chance in most sets is a premium HOF . With the B18 blankets the prices are reasonable. This is the green infield variation. This example has excellent clarity and registration. The printing is bright an easy to read on the pennants and the players name. It also has 4 nice Brown borders which is always important for a high grade blanket. 
The price is 49.00 plus 3.00 for usps without tracking and 5.00 with tracking
